review_text: I've had this machine for over a year, and I LOVE IT! It all started with looking for good low-carb ice cream and finding none that actually had flavor. We've made some great recipes with this. It's fast, easy to clean, and makes plenty for left-overs.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
